ai-thag2.2:1.1_0: “This life isn’t easy to live by means of life,
ai-thag2.2:1.2_0: but food doesn’t lead to peace of heart.
ai-thag2.2:1.3_0: Seeing how this bag of bones is sustained by food,
ai-thag2.2:2.1_0: They know it’s just a swamp,
ai-thag2.2:2.4_0: and hard for a sinner to give up.
ai-thag2.2:2.5_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Piṇḍolabhāradvāja.
